Augment.Name: Meteoric Star Ruby
Augment.Description: 2% chance On Hit to cause a falling star to strike your target, dealing 3 to 18 Fire Damage and 1 to 6 Bludgeoning Damage per Minimum Level of the weapon to all nearby enemies, with a chance to knock them prone. DC to resist knockdown: 20 + Item's ML vs Reflex Drops in: The Haunted Halls of Eveningstar, End Chest and optional dragon chest

Augment.Name: Ruby of Ghostbane
Augment.Description: Ghost Touch: An incorporeal creature's 50% chance to avoid damage does not apply to attacks with ghost touch weapons. 1 to 6 Bane damage on hit vs Undead Drops in: Joe Candymaker: The Night Revels Trader

Augment.Name: Ruby of Maiming
Augment.Description: Maiming: This weapon has a twisted haft or grip and spikes along its blade, head, or point. Whenever you score a critical hit with this weapon it deals an amount of extra untyped damage depending on its critical multiplier: x2 - 1 to 6, x3 - 2 to 12, x4 - 3 to 18. Drops in: ToEE: First Level and Earth Temple, and ToEE: Lower Temple Complex, rare encounter chests

Augment.Name: Ruby of the Adamantine Blessing
Augment.Description: Adamantine: Adamantine weapons may bypass the damage reduction of certain items and creatures. Drops in: Euphonia's Barter Box

Augment.Name: Ruby of the Crushing Wave
Augment.Description: Crushing Wave: This weapon stores the unstoppable force of the ocean's fury deep within. When this weapon is used, this power occasionally comes to the surface, crushing enemies beneath a torrent of frigid water. Drop Location: Ghost of a Chance (epic), puzzle chest

Augment.Name: Ruby of the Endless Night
Augment.Description: Inflicts a Negative Level on vorpal hits. Drop Location: Joe Candymaker: The Night Revels Trader

Augment.Name: Ruby of the Iron Hand
Augment.Description: Cold Iron: This iron mined deep underground, known for its effectiveness against fey creatures, is forged at a lower temperature to preserve its delicate properties. When combined with Good damage types, Cold Iron weapons are able to overcome the damage reduction of most Demons like Fire Reavers or Flesh Renders. See Monster DR and weaknesses for specifics. Drops in: Flurry: Snowpeaks Festival Trader

Augment.Name: Ruby of the Snowpeaks
Augment.Description: 1 to 8 Cold Damage Freezing Ice: This Weapon stores the pitiless immovable power of the ice deep within. When this weapon is used, this power occasionally comes to the surface, attempting to freeze an enemy solid and encase them in ice. 5% chance of Freezing Ice encasement. Fortitude save DC of 35, Freedom of movement blocks it; doesn't work on bosses, incorporeal, elementals, or oozes. Has a duration of 9 seconds, no recurring saves. Target is immobilized, and helpless (monsters take +25% damage from all sources.) Drop Location: Flurry: Snowpeaks Festival Trader

Augment.Name: Ruby of the Surging Tide
Augment.Description: Tidal Burst: This weapon is sheathed in water. The weapon deals an additional 1 to 4 damage each hit. In addition, critical hits deal an additional 1 to 8 damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 16 for a x3 critical multiplier and 3 to 24 for a x4 multiplier. Creatures with the Fire trait take double this damage instead. Drops in: Euphonia's Barter Box

Augment.Name: Ruby of the Vampire Slayer
Augment.Description: 1 to 4 Light Damage Silver: A complex process involving metallurgy and alchemy can bond silver to a weapon made of steel so that it bypasses the damage reduction of creatures such as devils and vampires. Silver weapons have 2 points lower hardness then equivalent steel weapons, and as such aren't quite as durable. Drops in: Joe Candymaker: The Night Revels Trader

Augment.Name: The Eye of Dolurrh
Augment.Description: This weapon gains Ghost Touch, and on each hit, deals 10d6 Evil damage.

Augment.Name: The Eye of Daanvi
Augment.Description: This weapon becomes Lawfully aligned, and on each hit, deals 10d6 extra Law damage to all non-Lawful enemies.

Augment.Name: The Eye of Lamannia
Augment.Description: This weapon becomes an Implement. +146 Equipment bonus to Positive and Force Spellpower.

Augment.Name: The Eye of Mabar
Augment.Description: This weapon becomes Evil aligned. You heal 5d2 damage per strike, and when you slay an enemy, you gain 15 Temporary HP. If you are Undead, this healing becomes Negative.

Augment.Name: The Eye of Shavarath
Augment.Description: You are immune to Fear. On a Critical Hit, this weapon applies the Shaken debuff.
